bio.line01: Waits in the darkness with timeless patience.
bio.line02: Does not sleep.
bio.line03: Looks forward to the signs that herald his end.

bio.line01: The Vigilant expected the right of atonement to kill her. So did she.
bio.line02: Can only remember her childhood when she surrenders to Heresy.
bio.line03: Fears that she will commit crimes for which there is no redemption.

bio.line01: Shots to his harddrive have corrupted most memories. Not sure which ones are real.
bio.line02: Feigns inactivity when being graffitied. Likes the attention.
bio.line03: Once KO'd a Gorzop, a Demonox, and a Giga-Tanker with a single uppercut.

bio.line01: So unpredictable, even he does not know what he'll do next.
bio.line02: No one can stay mad at him. Because he kills anyone who is mad at him.
bio.line03: Delights annoying Feng Mao to the point of distraction.

bio.line01: Once ransacked an entire village searching for his pipe.
bio.line02: Has never worshipped the Jambakka, despite the pleas of his parents.
bio.line03: Denies the rumor that he "lost" three apprentices in a single day.

bio.line01: Grim won EXE in a crooked game of Bone Dice. Instructions were not included.
bio.line02: EXE is able to extrapolate 73.2% of Grim's speech.
bio.line03: Since he acquired EXE, all of Grim's debts have been forgiven.

bio.line01: Believes that the purpose of all living things is to die, and feed the land.
bio.line02: More curious than the other Fey, thus she was chosen.
bio.line03: Loves all her "children".

bio.line01: Awakens each dawn with her body frozen, and the cries of the dead on her tongue.
bio.line02: Only kills that which can speak.
bio.line03: Narbash once gave her a pet frog; she asked no questions.

bio.line01: Remembers every meal she has ever had; taste, smell, and texture.
bio.line02: None have ever traveled to her lands, yet none doubt her claim to nobility.
bio.line03: Seeks that which is greater than herself, and believes she has found it.

bio.line01: As a child, practiced the bow until her fingers bled, then practiced some more.
bio.line02: Has been imprisoned many times.
bio.line03: Loves the hunt more than the kill.

bio.line01: Ran from every fight, until he lost it all, and stood up.
bio.line02: Has imprisoned Sparrow many times.
bio.line03: Keeps a lock of black hair in his boot, but no one knows why.

bio.line01: Dwelled in the jungle, alone, since the age of thirteen.
bio.line02: Has been worshiped as a vengeful nature god.
bio.line03: Does not speak. Unless he must.

bio.line01: Walks the palace walls before dawn, imagining the city in ruins.
bio.line02: The youngest warrior since Feng Mao to become First Guardian.
bio.line03: The documents affirming her bloodline are exceptional forgeries.

bio.line01: Her right arm doesn't belong to her.
bio.line02: Insists that each visitor drink tea, exchange gossip and then fight her.
bio.line03: Once capsized the High Sorcerer's pleasure barge to see if he could swim.

bio.line01: Once turned an actual battle into a dance battle through inspired drumming.
bio.line02: Ancient sculptures have been found that look just like him.
bio.line03: At least 600 people believe they are his best friend. They may all be correct.

bio.line01: Both were cast-out as runts. Suits them just fine.
bio.line02: Scorch once ate all the molotovs, passed out, and burned down an orphanage.
bio.line03: Iggy thinks he's a dinosaur. Scorch disagrees.

bio.line01: Has crushed the skull of every challenger in his tribe.
bio.line02: Still cannot defeat his grandmother in single combat.
bio.line03: Seeks the forgiveness of his gods.

bio.line01: Never utters the name of his sword in the hearing of others.
bio.line02: Believes in tradition and honoring one's parents.
bio.line03: Completely trusting, and often penniless.

bio.line01: Published an article on grenades: theory, practice, and aesthetics.
bio.line02: Charged with destruction, mayhem, and defacing public property.
bio.line03: Installed a humidor in his mech.

bio.line01: Has a not-so-secret gambling addiction.
bio.line02: Enjoys the company of machines more than people. Undecided about androids.
bio.line03: Joined the Mechanica at fifteen. Left it at sixteen.

bio.line01: Denies any affiliation with the Ying Mei Cartel, but drinks on their tab.
bio.line02: Has talked his way out of at least five executions.
bio.line03: Is pretty sure that he's a father.

bio.line01: Shot eleven times. Keeps five rounds in her desk, the other six in her bones.
bio.line02: Has a bounty on her head from the Ying Mei Cartel.
bio.line03: Personal life is a flaming mess.

bio.line01: Prefers a raw diet.
bio.line02: Enjoys camping in the wilderness.
bio.line03: A gifted storyteller.

bio.line01: Some believe she kills for pleasure.
bio.line02: Some believe she kills because she must.
bio.line03: Some believe neither of these is true.

bio.line01: Kallari believes he is addicted to the Shadow Plane.
bio.line02: Is banned from several bars on Omeda. Frequents them anyways.
bio.line03: Can be glib, but has never shared classified information. Except that one time.

bio.line01: Has difficulty hiring event staff due to wolf-related injuries.
bio.line02: Remixes and performs ancient songs, but saves her mother's favorite for herself.
bio.line03: Receives a simple protection charm on every birthday. Thinks it's from her sister.

bio.line01: Not okay with all her powers, but learning to live with them.
bio.line02: Had a surprisingly happy childhood.
bio.line03: Discovered Shinbi.

bio.line01: Holds the record for most entries in the Exotic Locales Codex.
bio.line02: Respected by all, feared by many, and loved by two.
bio.line03: Has a secret obsession with low budget holovids.

bio.line01: Always finds what he is looking for, and then kills it.
bio.line02: Born on Omeda, possessed on Letha.
bio.line03: Carries a bullet engraved with a woman's name.

bio.line01: Hasn't worked with a partner since the "incident."
bio.line02: Never mention his wife.
bio.line03: Once suspended by Lt. Belica for hiding stun traps in the lavatory.

bio.line01: Inmates learn to listen for the sound of the chains.
bio.line02: Enjoys soft music during long torture sessions.
bio.line03: Has a true passion for the detention industry.

bio.line01: Long ago requested that her personality module be rewritten, but no longer knows why.
bio.line02: Has had many jokes explained to her, and has diligently noted that they were humorous.
bio.line03: Can see infrared and ultraviolet, but not full human spectrum.

bio.line01: Understands the concept of mercy, just not as it applies to him.
bio.line02: First memory is the bay doors opening in low orbit.
bio.line03: Though many follow, denies being a leader.

bio.line01: Believes limits are for the meek.
bio.line02: On his sixth birthday, witnessed the death of a star. Fell in love.
bio.line03: Dekker suspects "Gideon" is not his true name.

bio.line01: Denies the rumor that she ever had a tail.
bio.line02: Believes that precision and process saves lives.
bio.line03: Dislikes most people, but feels compelled to help them anyway.

bio.line01: Owns the largest collection of things on Omeda.
bio.line02: Loved by his imaginary friends and respected by his imaginary enemies.
bio.line03: Consumes a wide range of proteins.
